text.sentence: Thanks! I'll get Lavo's title changed.
I spoke to our buddy in London this morning.
He seems to be doing wonderful, as usual.
He and Sue are getting ready to buy a new house in Twickenham, four bedrooms, garage (so he can park his new convertible home instead of across town) on the river.
Weddings almost every weekend for months.
I ran into Gaffer for the 1st time in months.
By his traveling schedule, I think we've really hired him to be a door to door salesman.
I heard the Mounties have arrived for you.
